channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Cookies of Christmas Past and Present
item.description: My plan: to make ten recipes over the course of a week.

item.title: Trump's Education Dept. to garnish wages of delinquent student borrowers in January
item.description: The Trump administration says it will kick off the new year by garnishing the wages of persons who are delinquent on student loan repayment, reversing...

item.title: Judge rules against Trump's attempt to remove security clearance of whistleblower attorney
item.description: A federal judge in Washington has ruled against President Trump's attempt to cancel a security clearance for an attorney who represents whistleblowers...

item.title: What Is Somaliland, and Do We Have to Care About It?
item.description: Israel’s recognition of the breakaway state could upend a sclerotic status quo in the region.

item.title: Gender-Affirming Care Ignores Human Physiology
item.description: Medical elites are redefining health. The human body didn’t get the memo.

item.title: Ben Sasse Reminds Us That Life Is Precious
item.description: The former senator announced last week that he has advanced cancer and does not expect to survive.

item.title: France’s Populist Surge Is a Cautionary Tale for America’s Right
item.description: Populism can win elections, but without fiscal discipline, it risks perpetuating the very welfare bloat it rails against.

item.title: With Reeves out, Mark Warner tightens his grip on Virginia Senate race
item.description: Sen. Mark R. Warner's path to reelection got a little clearer this week after Republican state Sen. Bryce Reeves bowed out of his short-lived campaign...

item.title: A look at how Trump-era work requirements could impact people who receive public benefits
item.description: The Trump administration made work requirements for low-income people receiving government assistance a priority in 2025.

item.title: Trump indicates the U.S. 'hit' a facility that he tied to alleged drug boats
item.description: President Donald Trump has indicated that the U.S. has "hit" a facility in South America as he wages a pressure campaign on Venezuela, but the U.S. of...
